Create a toothbrush that uses sound waves to clean your teeth instead of bristles.
Develop a toothpaste that contains natural ingredients like herbs and spices to freshen breath and whiten teeth.
Invent a toothbrush that vibrates at a specific frequency to massage your gums and promote healthy blood flow.
